text: The first game of a series that never came out of Japan unfortunately (Edit: correction, the 3rd entry on 3DS did!), especially since it seems to be quite good. I like how the soundtrack has the same naming convention as Koshiro's other work on the Etrian Odyssey series. It's not a coincidence since this game was made by the director behind the first Etrian Odyssey, Kazuya Niinou (bonus interesting fact: he's the director behind the Dragon Quest Builders series).
author: SupraDarky

text: Wait so 7th Dragon III Code is not part of the series?

author: knasbollicus

text: Hell yes!  I have been plowing through this series lately, and it's fantastic.  It is an absolute shame we never got the first three games stateside.  7th Dragon 2020-II was amazing, and Code VFD is a wonderfully nostalgic experience that just can't be seen to its fullest without playing the earlier games.  These games are definitely worth your time, and the first three games are all fully fan translated!
